hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/enqueue-scripts
hooks.description: Runs after GravityCalendar has enqueued scripts.

parameters.name: feed_id
parameters.description: The ID of the current feed being processed.

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/print-scripts/ . $feed_id
hooks.description: Runs after GravityCalendar has printed scripts. Used to prevent multiple enqueuings.

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/print-styles
hooks.description: Runs after GravityCalendar has enqueued styles.

parameters.name: feed_id
parameters.description: The ID of the current feed being processed.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycalendar/blocks/localization
hooks.description: Filters the localization data for GravityCalendar blocks.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycalendar/event-sources

parameters.name: event_sources
parameters.description: Array of calendar sources with the following keys: url, format, color.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycalendar/events/custom-response

parameters.name: feed_id
parameters.description: ID of the current feed being processed.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycalendar/events/filters
gk/gravitycalendar/feed/file-name
hooks.description: Modify the file name, without the file extension, for the ICS or JSON calendar attachment or file download.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: The file name for the ICS

parameters.name: feed
parameters.description: The Gravity Forms feed array that is being used to generate the file.

parameters.name: entry
parameters.description: The entry for the notification it will be attached to. Empty if displaying the whole feed.

hooks.name: gk/gravitycalendar/settings/db-batch-size

parameters.name: feed_id
parameters.description: ID of the current feed being processed.

parameters.name: db_query_batch_size
parameters.description: Maximum total number of events to fetch (default: 500).

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/default_locale
hooks.description: Filters the default fc locale value.

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/events

parameters.name: field_map
parameters.description: Array of feed fields mapped to calendar settings (e.g., start_time, end_time).

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/events/allow_invalid_start_date
gravityview/calendar/events/do_shortcodes

parameters.name: field_map
parameters.description: Array of feed fields mapped to calendar settings (e.g., start_time, end_time).

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/events/exclude

parameters.name: array
parameters.description: Array of entry IDs (default: empty array).

parameters.name: field_map
parameters.description: Array of feed fields mapped to calendar settings (e.g., start_time, end_time).

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/events/include

parameters.name: entry_ids
parameters.description: Array of entry IDs (default: empty array or entry IDs).

parameters.name: field_map
parameters.description: Array of feed fields mapped to calendar settings (e.g., start_time, end_time).

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/events/source_data

parameters.name: feed_id
parameters.description: ID of the current feed being processed

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/extra_options
gravityview/calendar/options
gravityview/calendar/scripts/fullcalendar

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Full URL to the jQuery FullCalendar script.

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/scripts/fullcalendar/locales
gravityview/calendar/scripts/fullcalendar/locales_dir_url
gravityview/calendar/settings/entry_status
gravityview/calendar/settings/sort_order

parameters.name: sorting
parameters.description: Default sort order (ASC by start date).

parameters.name: feed_id
parameters.description: ID of the current feed being processed.

parameters.name: field_map
parameters.description: Array of feed fields mapped to calendar settings (e.g., start_time, end_time).

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/settings/total-event-limit

parameters.name: feed_id
parameters.description: ID of the current feed being processed.

parameters.name: total_event_limit
parameters.description: Maximum total number of events to fetch (default: 1000).

hooks.name: gravityview/calendar/shortcode/render/element_attributes
